title: Poovukkenna Poottu Lyrics Bombay
stanzas: <div>Poovukkenna Poottu Lyrics Bombay

Poovukenna poottu
kaatrukkenna route-u
gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa

vaanum mannum yaarukku
neeyum naanum yaarukku
gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa

[nee siricha dheevaanaa
kai koduthaa masthaanaa
gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa

neeyum naanum onnaanaa
roopu thaeraa masthaanaa
gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa](2)

Soalaikku enna oru kavalai
eppodhum paravaigal
azhuvathillai.

sooriyanil endrum iravu illai.
eppodhum sorgathukku
thadai illai.

gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa
gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa

kaanathaane kangal
kanneer sindha illai.
megangal manvizhundhu
kaayangal aanathillai.(2)

vazhathaane vazhakai
veelvatharkku illai
sollaathaa jaadhi madham
iraivanum sollavillai.

nee siricha dheevaanaa
kai koduthaa masthaanaa
gullaa gullaa hallaa gullaa

neeyum naanum onnaanaa
roopu thaeraa masthaanaa
...
